document.full_text: actress kate winslet will author a book of celebrity self-portrait photos by ben stiller, jude law, meryl streep and others to support the treatment of autism, simon & schuster said on thursday.
document.title: kate winslet authors celebrity book for autism
lines_and_colors: actress kate winslet will author a book of celebrity self-portrait photos by ben stiller, jude law, meryl streep and others to support the treatment of autism, simon & schuster said on thursday.
